00012 #include "PropertyPageDialog.h"
00013 
00014 #include "PropertyPageView.h"
00015 
00016 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00017 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00018 #include <QGroupBox>

00020 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 // Function: PropertyPageDialog()
00022 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 PropertyPageDialog::PropertyPageDialog(QSize const& listIconSize, int maxListWidth,
00024                                        QSize const& itemSize, ApplyMode mode,
00025                                        QWidget* parent) : QDialog(parent), contentsList_(0),
00026                                                           pages_(0), btnOk_(0), itemSize_(itemSize),
00027                                                           mode_(mode)
00028 {
00029     // Create the contents list.
00030     contentsList_ = new QListWidget(this);
00031     contentsList_->setViewMode(QListView::IconMode);
00032     contentsList_->setIconSize(listIconSize);
00033     contentsList_->setMovement(QListView::Static);
00034     contentsList_->setMaximumWidth(maxListWidth);
00035     contentsList_->setSpacing(ICON_SPACING);
00036     contentsList_->setFlow(QListView::TopToBottom);
00037     
00038     // Create the stacked pages widget and a layout with a separator (group box).
00039     pages_ = new QStackedWidget(this);
00040 
00041     QGroupBox* separator = new QGroupBox(this);
00042     separator->setFlat(true);
00043 
00044     QVBoxLayout* pageLayout = new QVBoxLayout();
00045     pageLayout->addWidget(pages_);
00046     pageLayout->addStretch(1);
00047     pageLayout->addWidget(separator);
00048 
00049     // Create the layout for the contents list and pages.
00050     QHBoxLayout* horizontalLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00051     horizontalLayout->addWidget(contentsList_);
00052     horizontalLayout->addLayout(pageLayout, 1);
00053 
00054     // Create the buttons and their layout.
00055     btnOk_ = new QPushButton(tr("OK") , this);
00056     QPushButton* btnCancel = new QPushButton(tr("Cancel"), this);
00057 
00058     QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00059     buttonLayout->addStretch(1);
00060     buttonLayout->addWidget(btnOk_);
00061     buttonLayout->addWidget(btnCancel);
00062 
00063     // Create the main layout.
00064     QVBoxLayout* mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00065     mainLayout->addLayout(horizontalLayout, 1);
00066     mainLayout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00067 
00068     connect(btnOk_, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00069     connect(btnCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject()));
00070     connect(contentsList_, SIGNAL(currentItemChanged(QListWidgetItem*, QListWidgetItem*)),
00071             this, SLOT(changePage(QListWidgetItem*, QListWidgetItem*)));
00072 }

00074 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 // Function: ~PropertyPageDialog()
00076 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 PropertyPageDialog::~PropertyPageDialog()
00078 {
00079 }
00080 
00081 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 // Function: addPage()
00083 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 void PropertyPageDialog::addPage(QIcon const& icon, QString const& text, PropertyPageView* view)
00085 {
00086     // Create the list widget item for the page.
00087     QListWidgetItem* listItem = new QListWidgetItem(contentsList_);
00088     listItem->setIcon(icon);
00089     listItem->setText(text);
00090     listItem->setTextAlignment(Qt::AlignHCenter);
00091     listItem->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled);
00092     listItem->setSizeHint(itemSize_);
00093 
00094     // Add the page to the stacked pages.
00095     pages_->addWidget(view);
00096     contentsList_->setCurrentRow(0);
00097 
00098     // Connect the contentChanged() signal.
00099     connect(view, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(onContentChanged()));
00100 }
00101 
00102 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 // Function: changePage()
00104 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 void PropertyPageDialog::changePage(QListWidgetItem* current, QListWidgetItem* previous)
00106 {
00107     if (current == 0)
00108     {
00109         current = previous;
00110     }
00111 
00112     // Call onPageChange() for the previous page.
00113     if (previous != 0)
00114     {
00115         int prevIndex = contentsList_->row(previous);
00116         PropertyPageView* prevPage = static_cast<PropertyPageView*>(pages_->widget(prevIndex));
00117         Q_ASSERT(prevPage != 0);
00118 
00119         // Reject the page change if the previous page disallows it.
00120         if (!prevPage->onPageChange())
00121         {
00122             contentsList_->setCurrentItem(previous);
00123             return;
00124         }
00125     }
00126 
00127     pages_->setCurrentIndex(contentsList_->row(current));
00128     onContentChanged();
00129 }
00130 
00131 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132 // Function: accept()
00133 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00134 void PropertyPageDialog::accept()
00135 {
00136     if (mode_ == APPLY_CURRENT)
00137     {
00138         Q_ASSERT(pages_->currentWidget() != 0);
00139         PropertyPageView* page = static_cast<PropertyPageView*>(pages_->currentWidget());
00140 
00141         // Validate the contents of the page.
00142         if (!page->validate())
00143         {
00144             return;
00145         }
00146 
00147         QDialog::accept();
00148 
00149         // Apply the page.
00150         page->apply();
00151     }
00152     else if (mode_ == APPLY_ALL)
00153     {
00154         // First validate all pages.
00155         for (int i = 0; i < pages_->count(); ++i)
00156         {
00157             PropertyPageView* page = static_cast<PropertyPageView*>(pages_->widget(i));
00158 
00159             if (!page->validate())
00160             {
00161                 return;
00162             }
00163         }
00164 
00165         QDialog::accept();
00166 
00167         // Then apply all pages.
00168         for (int i = 0; i < pages_->count(); ++i)
00169         {
00170             PropertyPageView* page = static_cast<PropertyPageView*>(pages_->widget(i));
00171             page->apply();
00172         }
00173     }
00174 }
00175 
00176 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 // Function: onContentChanged()
00178 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00179 void PropertyPageDialog::onContentChanged()
00180 {
00181     Q_ASSERT(pages_->currentWidget() != 0);
00182 
00183     // Prevalidate the page to enable/disable the OK button.
00184     PropertyPageView* page = static_cast<PropertyPageView*>(pages_->currentWidget());
00185     btnOk_->setEnabled(page->prevalidate());
00186 }
